newsitem.title: ROMANIA: Romanian Carne-Arad H1 profit plummets.
newsitem.headline: Romanian Carne-Arad H1 profit plummets.

text.p: NOTE - Carne-Arad SA is a state meat processing firm. Data, reported according to Romanian accounting standards, were taken from its report to the Bucharest bourse. Company manager Voicu Ivascu said half-year profit was down due to higher meat purchasing prices and increased spending on energy and fuel.
